description: this is the font awesome 5 library. with a picker. it's dope. get a copy for yourself today.
name: eco_icon_picker
plugin_instructions:
put the picker somwhere on the page

add an action 
in the wf, grab the wfa to open the picker

set something to occur after the even 'icon_picked'

you can reference the stated 'picked_icon' to store the icon. 

you can use the icon viewer to display any of the icons selected from the picker
